testcase.name: test

error.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 238 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 232 milliseconds ago. ### The error may exist in com/demo/dao/UserMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.demo.dao.UserDao.getUserList ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 238 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 232 milliseconds ago.
